Employees are not subject to discrimination

To reach a sustainable future, every company must proactively investigate and monitor key practices - such as recruitment, pay structure, hiring and promotions - to ensure that no discrimination occurs, however unintentional it may be.

This is achieved by implementing an anti-discrimination policy and an accompanying concerns mechanism for discrimination-related issues, both of which should be actively communicated to all employees.
